entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near noon. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 44 this morning and minus 36 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Periods of light snow beginning after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 23. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 29 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind west 20 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 29 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 40 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Sunday 05 March 2023
